cast.name: 奥塔·伊奥塞里亚尼 Otar Iosseliani

director.name: 奥塔·伊奥塞里亚尼 Otar Iosseliani

this_title: Sept pièces pour cinéma noir et blanc
introduction: Seven Pieces for Black and White Cinema"Before we start work on the film "Les Favoris de la Lune", I tried to capture on film my first impressions of the city and the people who inhabit it. This etude of Paris, slightly shortened, was shown on television."Otar IosselianiSketches without dialogues includes empty faces in the subway, two singing drunkards, an old man with a cane leaves an apartment and disappears on a street bench, chewing citizens and dogs and some kind a gun duel in an office featuring iosseliani himself.
foreign_title: Sept pièces pour cinéma noir et blanc
